title: Intercultural exchange on architecture and the bathroom of the future - "East Meets West" Architecture ...
text: ( Source : Villeroy & Boch AG) October 2015 ' East Meets West ' was the motto of the International Architecture Conference that was held at the premises of Villeroy & Boch in Mettlach on 24 September 2015 . Architects , interior designers
